MemberSignature.Value: public void CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship (string targetForestName, System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection direction, string trustPassword);

.method public hidebysig instance void CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship(string targetForestName, valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection direction, string trustPassword) cil managed
Public Sub CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship (targetForestName As String, direction As TrustDirection, trustPassword As String)
public: void CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship(System::String ^ targetForestName, System::DirectoryServices::ActiveDirectory::TrustDirection direction, System::String ^ trustPassword);

param.name: targetForestName
param.span: The DNS name of the forest that the trust is created with.

span.span: The DNS name of the forest that the trust is created with.

param.name: direction
param.span: One of the members that determines the direction of the trust, relative to this forest.

span.span: One of the members that determines the direction of the trust, relative to this forest.

param.name: trustPassword
param.span: The password for the trust.

span.span: The password for the trust.

summary.span: Creates the local side of a trust relationship with the specified forest.

span.span: Creates the local side of a trust relationship with the specified forest.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 이 메서드는 트러스트 관계의 한 쪽을 만듭니다.This method creates one side of a trust relationship. 트러스트는 트러스트의 양쪽 모두 만든 될 때까지 설정 되지 않습니다.The trust is not established until both sides of the trust have been created. `trustPassword` 매개 변수는 만들어진된 트러스트를 사용 하 여 암호를 연결 합니다.The `trustPassword` parameter associates a password with the created trust. 트러스트의 다른 쪽을 만들 때에 동일한 암호를 제공 하 고 두 개의 로컬 트러스트 서로 바인딩된 다음.When the other side of the trust is created, the same password is provided and the two local trusts are then bound to each other. 트러스트 관계의 양쪽 모두에서 단일 메서드 호출을 프로그래밍 방식으로 만들려면 사용 합니다 메서드.To programmatically create both sides of a trust relationship in a single method call, use the method.

span.span: The trust relationship already exists.

span.span: A object that represents the forest that the trust is being created with.

param.name: direction
param.span: One of the members that determines the direction of the trust, relative to this forest.

span.span: One of the members that determines the direction of the trust, relative to this forest.

summary.span: Creates both sides of a trust relationship with the specified forest.

span.span: Creates both sides of a trust relationship with the specified forest.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 이 메서드는 단일 메서드 호출을 사용 하 여 트러스트 관계의 양쪽 모두를 만듭니다.This method creates both sides of a trust relationship with a single method call. 메서드 하나만 부분 트러스트를 만드는 데 사용 됩니다.The method is used to create only one side of a trust.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalogCollection FindAllDiscoverableGlobalCatalogs() cil managed

summary.span: Finds all of the discoverable global catalogs in this forest.

span.span: Finds all of the discoverable global catalogs in this forest.

returns.span: A that contains the collection of global catalogs that were found.

span.span: A that contains the collection of global catalogs that were found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks DNS SRV 레코드를 쿼리하여 검색 가능한 도메인 컨트롤러를 찾을 수 있습니다.You can find discoverable domain controllers by querying DNS SRV records. 일반, 비 특정 사이트, GC SRV 레코드를 등록 하는 글로벌 카탈로그만이 메서드에서 반환 됩니다.Only global catalogs that register a generic, non-site-specific, GC SRV record are returned by this method.

exception.span: The target server is either busy or unavailable.

span.span: The target server is either busy or unavailable.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalogCollection FindAllDiscoverableGlobalCatalogs(string siteName) cil managed
Public Function FindAllDiscoverableGlobalCatalogs (siteName As String) As GlobalCatalogCollection

param.name: siteName
param.span: The name of the site to search.

span.span: The name of the site to search.

summary.span: Finds all of the discoverable global catalogs in this forest in a specified site.

span.span: Finds all of the discoverable global catalogs in this forest in a specified site.

returns.span: A that contains the collection of global catalogs that were found.

span.span: A that contains the collection of global catalogs that were found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks DNS SRV 레코드를 쿼리하여 검색 가능한 글로벌 카탈로그를 찾을 수 있습니다.You can find discoverable global catalogs by querying DNS SRV records. 글로벌 카탈로그를 지정된 된 사이트의 GC SRV 레코드를 등록 하지 않습니다, 글로벌 카탈로그는 실제로 해당 사이트 내에 있는 경우에이 메서드에 의해 반환 되지 않습니다.If a global catalog does not register a GC SRV record for the specified site, it will not be returned by this method, even if the global catalog is physically located within that site. 지정된 된 사이트의 GC SRV 레코드를 등록 하는 모든 글로벌 카탈로그는 해당 사이트 내에 물리적으로 아닐 수도 있는 경우에이 메서드에서 반환 됩니다.All global catalogs which register a GC SRV record for the specified site will be returned by this method, even if they might not be physically located within that site.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool GetSelectiveAuthenticationStatus(string targetForestName) cil managed
Public Function GetSelectiveAuthenticationStatus (targetForestName As String) As Boolean

param.name: targetForestName
param.span: The DNS name of the with which the inbound trust relationship exists.

span.span: The DNS name of the with which the inbound trust relationship exists.

summary.span: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether selective authentication is enabled on the inbound trust relationship with the specified forest.

span.span: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether selective authentication is enabled on the inbound trust relationship with the specified forest.

summary.span: if selective authentication is enabled; otherwise, .

span.span: if selective authentication is enabled; otherwise, .

returns.span: if selective authentication is enabled; otherwise, .

span.span: if selective authentication is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 포리스트 트러스트에 대 한 선택적 인증을 사용할 경우 사용 권한은 수동으로 설정 해야 각 도메인에 다른 포리스트의 사용자가 액세스할 수 있도록 하려면 로컬 포리스트에 있는 리소스입니다.For a forest trust, if you opt for selective authentication, permissions must be manually enabled on each domain and resource in the local forest to which you want users in the other forest to have access. 선택적는 트러스트를 통해 사용자를 인증할 때 인증을 사용는 Other Organization SID (보안 ID)는 사용자의 권한 부여 데이터에 추가 됩니다.When a user authenticates across a trust for which selective authentication is enabled, an Other Organization security ID (SID) is added to the user's authorization data. 이 SID가 있으면 사용자가 특정 서비스를 인증할 수 있는지 확인하도록 리소스 도메인을 확인하라는 메시지가 표시됩니다.The presence of this SID prompts a check on the resource domain to ensure that the user is allowed to authenticate to the particular service. 사용자가 인증 되 면 사용자를 인증 하는 서버는 Other Organization SID 아직 없는 경우이 Organization SID를 추가 합니다.After the user is authenticated, the server that authenticates the user adds the This Organization SID if the Other Organization SID is not already present. 인증된 사용자의 컨텍스트에는 이러한 특수 SID 중 하나만 있을 수 있습니다.Only one of these special SIDs can be present in an authenticated user's context.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RaiseForestFunctionality(valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestMode forestMode) cil managed

param.name: forestMode
param.span: A enumeration value that specifies the new operation level for the forest.

span.span: A enumeration value that specifies the new operation level for the forest.

summary.span: Raises the mode of operation for the forest.

span.span: Raises the mode of operation for the forest.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 값 발생 수 있지만 내릴 수는 없습니다.The value can be raised but not lowered. 즉, 되돌릴 수 없는 포리스트의 기능 수준을 올리는이 작업을 수행 하는 결정을 신중 하 게 해야 합니다.This means that raising the functionality level of the forest is not reversible and the decision to do this should be made carefully. 포리스트의 작동 모드에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 하세요. [도메인 및 포리스트 기능](http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/WindowsServ/2003/standard/proddocs/en-us/sag_levels.asp)합니다.For more information about forest operational modes, see [Domain and forest functionality](http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/WindowsServ/2003/standard/proddocs/en-us/sag_levels.asp). 다음 테이블에 대 한 유효한 값이 정의 `forestMode` 포리스트의 현재 운영 모드를 기준으로 합니다.The following table defines the valid values for `forestMode` based on the current operating mode of the forest. |현재 모드Current mode|모드에 발생할 수 있습니다.Mode can be raised to| |------------------|---------------------------| ||

| ||| ||없음None|

Public Sub SetSidFilteringStatus (targetForestName As String, enable As Boolean)
public: void SetSidFilteringStatus(System::String ^ targetForestName, bool enable);

param.name: targetForestName
param.span: The DNS name of the object with which the trust relationship exists.

span.span: The DNS name of the object with which the trust relationship exists.

param.name: enable
param.span: if SID filtering is to be enabled; otherwise, .

span.span: if SID filtering is to be enabled; otherwise, .

summary.span: Sets the SID filtering state with the specified forest.

span.span: Sets the SID filtering state with the specified forest.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 기본적으로 새 외부 및 포리스트 트러스트에 [!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)] Active Directory Domain Services SID 필터링을 적용 합니다.By default, new external and forest trusts in [!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)] Active Directory Domain Services enforce SID filtering. SID 필터링은 다른 사용자 계정에 관리자 권한으로 권한을 부여 하려고 하는 악의적인 사용자 로부터 공격을 방지 하기 위해 사용 됩니다.SID filtering is used to prevent attacks from malicious users who might try to grant elevated user rights to another user account. 포리스트 트러스트에 SID 필터링을 적용 해도 마이그레이션을 같은 포리스트 내의 도메인 SID 기록을 사용 하 여 및 유니버설 그룹 액세스 제어 전략에 영향을 주지 않습니다.Enforcing SID filtering on forest trusts does not prevent migrations to domains within the same forest from using SID history and will not affect your universal group access control strategy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 이 메서드는 트러스트 관계를 완전히 설정 되었는지 확인 합니다.This method verifies that a trust relationship has been fully established. 트러스트는 트러스트의 양쪽 모두 만든 될 때까지 설정 되지 않습니다.The trust is not established until both sides of the trust have been created.
